content:
I'm going to start holding open office hours, using http://meet.jit.si. Say hi, chat about WASI or related things. I'm starting today at 11:00pm UTC, and tomorrow, July 26, at 02:00pm UTC, repeating weekly. Send me a private message for a meeting URL!

Jitsi Meet
Join a WebRTC video conference powered by the Jitsi Videobridge
